about_the_game:
A black cat. A mysterious boy in overalls. And YOU!

It's summer break and your parent's have decided to leave you with your grandparents for a week. An entire week! On a mountain, in the middle of nowhere.

Unlock strange new worlds of imagination as you explore your grandparent's mansion, and meet a cast of quirky and mysterious characters that may (or may not) be real.

Make friends and perhaps even enemies as you traverse a sea made entirely of sand, a strange, alien planet or a realm of Fae creatures that might be more trick-some than you could even imagine.

Explore a hand drawn, animated world defined by your actions!

Features

  • Make decisions that will define your story! Each choice you make will have an impact on the world around you both within the realm of imagination and in the real world.

  • Find items to solve mysteries in unexpected ways. No two play through will be the same as you discover new ways to solve the challenges you are faced with.

  • Each page is meticulously hand drawn. Transport yourself into beautiful worlds full of adventure, danger and mystery brought to life through bespoke art.

  • Lean back and listen to a fully narrated tale of friendship and daring! Or read along at your own pace, either to yourself or aloud with a friend or loved one.

  • Accessibility is top of mind. Customize your experience with hand picked themes and friendly fonts for readers with dyslexia.

  • Over an hour of original music. Produced to immerse you into the theme of each chapter.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 Ghz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A family friendly adventure visual novel that makes reading fun! Accessibility is top of mind with voice-acted read-along narration with friendly fonts for readers with dyslexia. Experience hand drawn art and make important choices to determine how your story unfolds.
